Observed at: Lac La Biche 9:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Temperature: 7.9°C

Humidity: 32 %
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with a few showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
